code:
import api from'./api';// Signup
export const signup=async(name,email,password)=>{const response=await api.post('/auth/signup',{name,email,password});if(response.data.token){localStorage.setItem('token',response.data.token);}return response.data;};// Login
export const login=async(email,password)=>{const response=await api.post('/auth/login',{email,password});if(response.data.token){localStorage.setItem('token',response.data.token);}return response.data;};// Logout
export const logout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('token');};
